name: Loom Embed
description:
Loom is the video communication tool for async work. You can express your thoughts in less time, sharing quick feedback, or deep communication with just a click.The Loom widget allows you to embed public Loom videos in your FigJim board, adding rich video context.


Use embedded Looms in FigJam to walk through and explain your board, drop in additional historical context, and add personality to asynchronous collaboration.


You can add Loom videos to your board in seconds. Launch the widget, then click on the embed button, and paste in your Loom share URL. Hit Submit and place the video wherever you need to add more context to your board.


Currently, the widget only works for public Loom videos! Adding a Loom share URL that is private will prompt the user to open the Loom video in a browser.
